id: Business OS: The Notion System for Entrepreneurs
name: Business OS: The Notion System for Entrepreneurs
description: Is your business a mess of scattered notes, missed deadlines, and lost client info?You're working hard, but you feel reactive and disorganized. You need a simple, central place to manage everything without the complexity of a dozen different apps.The Business OS is a Notion system built from first principles for freelancers, consultants, and small business owners who want to replace chaos with clarity.This isn't just another template. Itâ€™s a complete, interconnected system to run your business.W
features: Dashboard:A command center that shows you exactly what to focus on today.; Projects & Tasks:A streamlined view to manage your work and never miss a deadline.; Simple CRM:Track your leads and manage client information, all connected to your projects.; Knowledge Wiki:A central brain for your business to store processes, guides, and resources.; Vision Hub:A dedicated space to keep your goals front and center.; Freelancers & Consultantswho need to manage multiple clients and projects.; Entrepreneursbuilding a business from the ground up.; Small teamsthat want to organize their work and processes with an operating system.; Anyone who wants to move from being a reactive task-doer to an intentional business-builder.
